fields.label: How to start Transition: Developing an initiating group
fields.name: group_1

sub_fields.label: We have a working initiating/core group of between 4 and 15 people
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: Our group has a shared understanding of what Transition is and why it's needed
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: Our group has registered on TN website or national hub
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: We have made contact with nearby initiatives
sub_fields.name: q4

sub_fields.label: We've thought about the area we're covering and is as close to the ideal range as is workable
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: We are aware of the opportunities and challenges of doing Transition in our community
sub_fields.name: q6

sub_fields.label: At least one person in our group has more in depth knowledge of Transition through attending training or reading books or web sites.
sub_fields.name: q7

sub_fields.label: Our group has clear and agreed aims and objectives
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: Our group gets things done
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: Members are clear about their responsibilities and roles
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: We have an agreed code of conduct (working principles or ways of working)
sub_fields.name: q4

sub_fields.label: We have clear and agreed processes for making, recording and following up on decisions
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: We have effective meetings with a clear agenda, discussion and minutes
sub_fields.name: q6

sub_fields.label: We spend time in our meetings reflecting on how we work together
sub_fields.name: q7

sub_fields.label: We have thought about how our meetings are facilitated or chaired
sub_fields.name: q8

sub_fields.label: We have discussed and come to agreement about how power and leadership work in our group
sub_fields.name: q9

sub_fields.label: There are processes for new people to join, and existing members to leave
sub_fields.name: q10

sub_fields.label: When differences or conflict have arisen we have handled it well
sub_fields.name: q11

sub_fields.label: We have a shared understanding of challenges like resource depletion, pollution, inequality, economic vulnerability, that require us to create a new vision for the future
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: Our group has a shared vision of our community in the future
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: Our vision is positive, inspiring and plausible
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: We have explored and understand how to include and work with diverse visions
sub_fields.name: q4

sub_fields.label: [Advanced] We can balance the need for a plan to create a positive future with enough flexibility to meet what is unknown
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: [Advanced] We have engaged our community in developing a positive vision of the future
sub_fields.name: q6

sub_fields.label: We understand who is in our community and how to communicate with and involve them in our group/projects in a meaningful way
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: We spend time listening to what’s important for different people in our community
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: We understand current local issues/concerns and can relate Transition messages to these
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: We use a range of styles and types of awareness raising and engagement methods
sub_fields.name: q4
sub_fields.instructions:
(a) for people at different stages of change 
(b) for different demographic and cultural groups 
(c) for different themes
 (d) for people who engage through head, heart and hands

sub_fields.label: We know how to put on events that are enjoyable, inspiring, connecting and participative
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: We use both altruistic messages (pro-social and environmental) and self-interested messages (about practical benefits) to motivate and engage people
sub_fields.name: q6

sub_fields.label: We have used Open Space and / or similar processes to invite ideas and involvement of local people
sub_fields.name: q7

sub_fields.label: We promote and publicise our events and projects through relevant local media
sub_fields.name: q8

sub_fields.label: We have connections with key local organisations such as schools, businesses, landowners, community groups
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: We have thought about who to partner with and for what purpose
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: We make an effort to do things in partnership with other groups or organisations.
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: We have made contact with our local government
sub_fields.name: q4

sub_fields.label: Some people involved in our group have lived in this place for many years
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: We are seen by other groups as positive, collaborative, and helpful
sub_fields.name: q6

sub_fields.label: We are connected to a diverse range of groups in our community (e.g. income, ethnicity, life stage)
sub_fields.name: q7

sub_fields.label: We have managed difficulties in our relationship with other groups (if this has occurred)
sub_fields.name: q8

sub_fields.label: [Advanced] We have a strategic plan for networking and partnerships
sub_fields.name: q9

sub_fields.label: [Advanced] We promote the work of other groups in our community
sub_fields.name: q10

sub_fields.label: We feed back what has been achieved to group volunteers/members, wider community and stakeholders
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: We take time to celebrate achievements
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: We spend time together socially
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: We make time/space made for learning and reflection
sub_fields.name: q4

sub_fields.label: We are open to working with and learning from people outside our group/network
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: We have established a monitoring system to track and assess how well we are doing, and use learning to adapt our strategy
sub_fields.name: q6

sub_fields.label: We have a creative attitude to experimentation and learn from our failures.
sub_fields.name: q7

sub_fields.label: We run a range of practical projects that benefit local people
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: Our projects are relevant and accessible to people on low incomes, with disabilities and from different cultures
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: We take active measures to reduce barriers to participation (eg by involving people in the design of projects, ensuring inclusive communication, access to grants, crèches etc
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: Our projects have appropriate legal and governance structures and we understand our legal responsibilities
sub_fields.name: q4

sub_fields.label: We have the skills we need to manage and implement our projects effectively
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: We know who has expertise locally and how to draw on it
sub_fields.name: q6

sub_fields.label: [Advanced] The projects and the enterprises that we generate create and create livelihoods for local people
sub_fields.name: q7

sub_fields.label: We are aware of the emotional significance and depth of the issues that transition addresses and understand how to work with these
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: We regularly check as individuals and as a group on our personal resilience and risk of burnout
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: We understand the need for inner and outer skills within Transition and can include the inner dimension in a way that is accessible
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: We have created support structures for ourselves and for others involved in Transition (one to one or group)
sub_fields.name: q4

sub_fields.label: In our group we spend time building trust and deepening our relationships
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: We learn from others in the Transition movement.
sub_fields.name: q1

sub_fields.label: We have an established channel of communication with our regional or national hub and/or Transition Network.
sub_fields.name: q2

sub_fields.label: When we do something that other groups can learn from we share our learning
sub_fields.name: q3

sub_fields.label: We attend conferences or events (or online webinars or trainings) put on by our regional or national hub or Transition Network.
sub_fields.name: q4

sub_fields.label: We make sure that our contact details on our Transition Profile are up to date
sub_fields.name: q5

sub_fields.label: All of our members are signed up to the Transition Network Newsletter
sub_fields.name: q6
